name: ecosim (Artyom Gabtraupov)
description:
**Click on an entity to lock on to it and view its stats**

Camera Movement: WASD, QE, Shift and Mouse

This isn't really a game but more of a simulation. Watch the populations of wolves and bunnies grow and watch their interactions. 

Will the wolves eat all the rabbits and starve to death or will the populations stay relatively the same?

Made in a week. Also rabbit and wolf textures are differently not bugs I was too lazy to fix.
